techmeme.title: Amazon expects to boost its capex to $100B in 2025, largely driven by AI and up from 2024's ~$83B, on what Andy Jassy calls a "once-in-a-lifetime" opportunity (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
Sources: Apple plans to unveil its long-awaited overhaul of the iPhone SE as early as next week, opting to reveal it on its website instead of at a launch event (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Affirm reports Q2 revenue up 47% YoY to $866M, vs. $807M est., GMV up 35% YoY to $10.1B, and active consumers up 23% YoY to 21M; AFRM jumps 10%+ after hours (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
DOGE staffer Marko Elez resigns after being linked to racist posts on X; he was embedded in the US Treasury and previously worked at SpaceX, Starlink, and X (Katherine Long/Wall Street Journal)
Take-Two reports Q3 net bookings up 3% YoY to $1.37B, vs. $1.39B est., and reiterates GTA VI is set to launch in the fall of 2025; TTWO jumps 6%+ after hours (Zaheer Kachwala/Reuters)
